DefectReportPDF.set_doc_option¶

DefectReportPDF.set_doc_option(opt, value)¶

Defines a document option.

Parameters

  • opt (str) – name of the option to set

  • value (str) –

Deprecated since version 2.4.0: Simply set the core_fonts_encoding property as a replacement.
